I've searched the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> thread for direction, but I haven't found what I need yet. i created a custom Account object. i also created an association between Account and Deal. how can i delete the association between Account and Deal? i'm not looking to delete an association label or the an association between Deal and Account records. I want to delete the association altogether as Account should not be related to Deal. i believe i could do this by dropping/recreating my custom Account object, but this would require a great deal of work. also, i've been pointed to the developer api documentation as well but it is not sufficiently intelligible for me to know what to do. an example call that does what i'm looking for would be greatly appreciated. thanks in advance!

I figured this out. I used Postman and the objectIds in the URL when viewing the association in HubSpot. I did a GET to find the typeId of the association then a DELETE using the object Ids and the association typeId.

The v2 sig auth is only used in the Custom Workflow Actions I believe, most other flows use the v3 sig auth which does utilize the timestamp at least, but the v2 is only Client Secret + HTTP method + URI + body then hashed

this sounds like something that's totally the responsibility of the 3rd party app.

And not sure what you mean by "disconnected". The private app is using a rest api to make requests to HubSpot... There's no connection maintained.
